# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an image format with an integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: UInt32)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw integer value of the image format.

## Constants

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes an image format with a raw integer value.
